chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: O sing unto the LORD a new song; for he hath done marvellous things: his right hand, and his holy arm, hath gotten him the victory.
items.plainText: O sing unto the LORD a new song; for he hath done marvellous things: his right hand, and his holy arm, hath gotten him the victory.

items.text: The LORD hath made known his salvation: his righteousness hath he openly shewed in the sight of the heathen.
items.plainText: The LORD hath made known his salvation: his righteousness hath he openly shewed in the sight of the heathen.

items.text: He hath remembered his mercy and his truth toward the house of Israel: all the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God.
items.plainText: He hath remembered his mercy and his truth toward the house of Israel: all the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God.

items.text: Make a joyful noise unto the LORD, all the earth: make a loud noise, and rejoice, and sing praise.
items.plainText: Make a joyful noise unto the LORD, all the earth: make a loud noise, and rejoice, and sing praise.

items.text: Sing unto the LORD with the harp; with the harp, and the voice of a psalm.
items.plainText: Sing unto the LORD with the harp; with the harp, and the voice of a psalm.

items.text: With trumpets and sound of cornet make a joyful noise before the LORD, the King.
items.plainText: With trumpets and sound of cornet make a joyful noise before the LORD, the King.

items.text: Let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof; the world, and they that dwell therein.
items.plainText: Let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof; the world, and they that dwell therein.

items.text: Let the floods clap their hands: let the hills be joyful together
items.plainText: Let the floods clap their hands: let the hills be joyful together

items.text: Before the LORD; for he cometh to judge the earth: with righteousness shall he judge the world, and the people with equity.
items.plainText: Before the LORD; for he cometh to judge the earth: with righteousness shall he judge the world, and the people with equity.
